climatePledgeFriendly.details: Compact by Design (Certified by Amazon) products remove excess air and water, which reduces the carbon footprint of shipping and packaging.

body.description: Packed full of patterns. This mighty 100ct refill pack comes with fourteen colors and patterns in three different sizes so you always have a favorite on hand. It’s also great for refilling your empty Welly tin—pour ‘em on in! Because when you’re ready for anything, everything is possible. Welly is for everyone that was afraid to fall down, fail, get bumped, get scratched and did it anyway. Welly is for the wellness in all of us, however that looks, and for being prepared for whatever comes our way. We wear our bandages like badges of honor for a life fully lived. Our portable first aid kits are packed with essentials, so you have what you need, when you need it. And our signature Welly tins can be reused again and again—the possibilities are endless. Read more

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Welly Bandages - Bravery Badges Welly First Aid Kit Welly Face Savers Hydrocolloid Bandages Welly Bandages - 100 Ct Value Pack Welly Bandages - 200 Ct Refill Ready Pack Welly Bandages - 80 Ct Family Pack What's Included Fabric Bandages (various patterns available) Fabric Bandages (Small, Standard, Waterproof, Rectangle), Tape and Non-Stick Pads, Butterfly Strips, Singe Use Ointments Transparent Hydrocolloid Bandages (various options available) Assorted Fabric Bandages Assorted Fabric Bandages Assorted Fabric & Waterproof Bandages Reusable and Collectable Tin ✓ ✓ ✓ Latex Free ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have eczema on my hands so I go through a whooole lot of bandages. Having my fingers bandaged for days on end gets annoying fast, mostly because of things like bulky strips limiting how much I can bend my fingers and crappy adhesive making the bandages not last as long.These bandages are some of the best I’ve used. They’re flexible, not too bulky, stay on well. They’re my favorites along with bamboo, though bamboo tends to be a bit more expensive. And the patterns make these more pleasant to look at haha.My only complaint is that the individual bandage packaging can be a little more difficult to open than others, but it’s still worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a bandaid
reviews.reviewText: Well, if these don't accentuate your Papercuts/blisters/any injury, I don't know what would. They're cute, trendy, and fun. The stick is nice, I have one on my finger right now. I keep a supply in my coaches bag for basketball, the girls love going through and picking their favorite. If you're in the market for a trendy, aesthetic, bougie Band-Aid this is the one for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Potty training reward
reviews.reviewText: My daughter loves band aids so I got these for the sole purpose of rewarding her for sitting on the potty. And they’re no match for the bath, they do not automatically become unsticky in bath water 🙄🥴

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Always bring yer wellies
reviews.reviewText: Don't throw away those adorable Welly canisters, and don't feel bad having more than one (or five) - you can always refill them with similarly adorable and functional bandages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Only Bandaids I can use
reviews.reviewText: I am super allergic to adhesives, but for some reason these do not irritate my skin. I can finally use bandaids again! Not to mention, they are so cute!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are perfect! Work very well for my husband who’s skin is very thin after years of skin damage! Only band aid that we’ve found that does not pull his skin off when removing! Highly recommended!!!! Amazing product? Thank You!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We love welly bandages. These came exactly as described and a little earlier than originally expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These bandaids are the absolute best. This pack doesn’t come with a tin can but it does come with a little divider tray that separates the bigger ones and smaller ones. They have all different sizes. They are super durable as well.
